name: Learn a Language
short: The basics are fine! It may also make a holiday much more enjoyable.

name: Pickle and Ferment
short: Learn how to pickle and ferment. So many great flavours and so many options!

name: Awesome Omelette
short: There's a lot of ways to cook an egg. Spend some time perfecting a recipe for you.

name: Contribute to Science
short: There are many ways that you can contribute from home.

name: Five Spices
short: Blindfold yourself and pick 5 random spices at the supermarket. Figure out a dish for each.

name: Pomodoro
short: Give the pomodoro way of working a try.

name: Rube Goldberg
short: Construct your own Rube-Goldberg machine.

name: Breathing Exercises
short: Buy a straw and breathe through it. It gives youa calm heart rate. These exercises really have an effect.

name: Make a Mashup
short: If you have a Mac, you have garageband. Heard two songs that'd sound good together? You're the DJ.

name: Try Knitting
short: It's relaxing and it gives you clothing! Scarves are easy to start with, but warm socks are amazing too!

name: Mini Garden
short: Help something grow and get tasty snacks or herbs at the end of it! Plant a few herbs or some flowers to sit on your kitchen windowsill.

name: Mathematical Arts
short: Even if you were never good at it, they can inspire some pretty cool drawings.

name: Bake Bread
short: It can be very rewarding. It'll make your kitchen smell nice too!

name: Bounce the Ball
short: You've seen the youtube videos with long chains of ping-pong balls bouncing. Set your own record!

name: No Plastic
short: Don't buy anything this month if it will cause plastic waste.

name: Cat Furniture
short: Give your feline something that it can sink nails into.

name: Lazer Cutting
short: Design things in your home by lazer cutting.

name: Start Composting
short: If you have a garden you can turn your trash into good soil. Add worms and you'll have less waste!

name: Gift a Stranger
short: Give you some you receive some! Join the anonymous gift-giving competitions.

name: Sock Puppets
short: You probably have some old socks lying around. Don't throw them away, make the most beautiful sock puppet with the family.

name: Running Competition
short: There's the Santa Run. But also the Utrecht one.

name: Vegan Week
short: Do the proper research and prepare for a vegan week. Challenge your cooking!

name: Latte Art
short: Treat yourself to the best and prettiest coffee! Learn how to make latte art.

name: Pick Up a Ukelele
short: It tends to be one of the cheapest, but also easiest to learn musical instruments out there.

name: Celebrate Boardgames
short: Turn the tv off. Monday evenings this month is now boardgame night!

name: Use the Oven
short: Let's use that thing! Learn new recipes for that oven!

name: New Tricks
short: Teach your pet new tricks this month! You might eventry to teach your cat a new trick.

name: Train Pushups
short: How many can you do right now? Can you triple it by the end of the month?

name: Fresh Pasta
short: Learn to make fresh pasta. Hard work. But rewarding!

name: Swap Transport
short: Try out biking, public transport, carpooling or skating instead of your usual mode of transport.

name: Furniture Socks
short: Try and make socks for chair- and table-legs. It's much easier to make with and it adds color to the house.

name: Lego Challenge
short: Buy a box of legos and build it ... without using the instructions manual. Throw it away!

name: Photoshop Battle
short: On reddit there's a photoshop battle that's often humerous. Also a great excuse to learn.

name: Donate
short: Go through your old clothes, books, and household items, and set aside a box to donate to friends or charity.

name: Museum Virtual Tour
short: You can visit some of the best collections in the world online, such as the Louvre Museum. Google it!

name: Play with Sensors
short: Buy a raspberry pi with some sensors and start measuring the world.

name: Money Jar
short: Turn this into a challenge. While keeping it healthy, how long can you last $50 in a supermarket?

name: Measure Electricity
short: Measure and defeat the energy vampires. Save some money too.

name: Photo Album
short: Create a photo album.

name: World Digital Library
short: Google it! You can search 19,147 items about 193 countries between 8000 BCE and 2000.

name: Spring Cleaning
short: Let's be honest, it might be overdue. It is super rewarding to be in a clean house though!

name: Ergonomics
short: Your future you will thank all the small improvements you'll make today.

name: Meditate
short: You've probably told yourself you should.Give it a chance this month!

name: Repair Clothes
short: Learn to make small repairs to clothes. It saves money and it might save your favorite t-shirt.

name: Write Thoughts
short: It may be a diary or a notebook, either way it's a good habit.

name: Listen to Podcasts
short: Tune down the music and listen to podcasts while you're in transit. You might learn something.

name: Yoga
short: It's easy to get started with and could be a great stress relief. Try it.

name: Trade Clothes
short: Help eachother to new clothing without spending a dime. Make it last!

name: Solve Rubix
short: Maybe it is about time. Learn to solve a rubix cube!

name: Volunteer
short: There's a lot of places that appreciate help. Volunteer for something you care about.

name: Childhood Books
short: Read the books you loved when you were a kid. Odds are there's audiobooks for them too.

name: Banana Pancakes
short: Treat yourself every sunday this month! Banana pancakes for the win!

name: Magic Cards Tricks
short: There's a lot of cool card tricks to learn. Just don't overdo the party tricks.

name: Survive as a Vegetarian
short: Do it for a full month! It really forces you to learn to cook with spices.

name: Pancake Art
short: Doodle a face and then eat it. Combine creativity with food. Cool for kids too.

name: Open Source
short: You can start contributing to it by adding an idea to this repository!

name: Paint on a Canvas
short: Unleash your inner Picasso (or maybe you are more like van Gogh?),and paint the world's (or your kitchen's) next masterpiece.

name: Pet Toys
short: Make your own toys for your own pets. Fun for you, fun for them.

name: Make Your Own Sauce
short: Making your own ketchup is a super rewarding experience.BBQ-Sauce too!

name: Pet Fame
short: Make an effort to turn your pet into a star on the internet!

name: New Hair
short: Mix it up! Suprise yourself and tell the barber to give you a new style.

name: Digital Minimalism
short: Focus your online time on a carefully selected activities that support the things you value.

name: Sign Language
short: They're fun to learn. Simple gestures to make the world a more inclusive place <3.

name: Learn to Say Thanks
short: ... in 50 languages! You'll always have a happy waiter where-ever you'll go.

name: Tech Cleanup
short: Try - or even better, switch to - an (ethical) tech alternative.

name: Learn to Draw
short: Watch a few youtube videos. Try, try, and try again. Try drawing the same thing in different styles!

name: No Purchases
short: You're allowed to prepare for this one. Force yourself to plan ahead and don't buy anything for a full week.

name: Perfect a Pizza
short: Pick a day of the week. This day, is pizza day. It is your mission to find the perfect recipe for you.
